newsitem.title: MOZAMBIQUE: MOZAMBICAN GUNMAN HIT BELOW THE BELT.
newsitem.headline: MOZAMBICAN GUNMAN HIT BELOW THE BELT.

text.p: An inept gunmen shot himself in the testicles after a failed attempt to rob a shop in the Mozambican capital Maputo, police said on Friday.
The police said they cornered the man and his four fellow thieves at the shop in the Maputo suburb of Malanga on Tuesday.
As the police moved in to arrest the crooks, one of them reached for a pistol, hidden in his trousers.
But the gun went off accidentally as he tried to pull it out, wounding his private parts. All five robbers were arrested and the injured man is in hospital.
